undirected; 

N = 10000;

F1 {[1:1:1]};
F2 {[2:1:N+1]};
F3 {[10002:1:20001]};
F4 {[20002:1:30000]};
F5 {[30001:1:39999]};
F6 {[40000:1:40000]};
U1 {[40001:1:50000]};
U2 {[50001:1:60000]};
U3 {[60001:1:70000]};
U4 {[70001:1:80000]};

F1[1:1:1] - U1[1:1:1];
F2[1:1:10000] - U1[1:1:10000];
F2[1:1:10000] - U2[1:1:10000];
F3[1:1:10000] - U1[1:1:10000];
F3[1:1:10000] - U3[1:1:10000];
F4[1:1:9999] - U2[2:1:10000];
F4[1:1:9999] - U3[2:1:10000];
F5[1:1:9999] - U1[1:1:9999];
F5[1:1:9999] - U1[2:1:10000];
F5[1:1:9999] - U4[1:1:9999];
F6[1:1:1] - U1[10000:1:10000];
F6[1:1:1] - U4[10000:1:10000];
